title: Los Angeles/Wilshire
name: Los Angeles County Museum of Art (LACMA)
hours: M-Tu, Th 11AM-5PM, F 11AM-8PM, Sa-Su 10AM-7PM, W closed
price: Adults $15, students and seniors $10, children under 18 free. Free general admission for everyone on the second Tu of each month
content: Features particularly strong collections of Asian, Latin American, European, and American art, as well as a new contemporary museum on its campus, BCAM.
